body_html:
thanks for the PR, we have a WIP implementation of more efficient code that implements GroupNorm (dedicated GPU code) that @SsnL was going to PR today or tomorrow (as soon as the paper was out :) ). Additional to the implementation, one needs tests, which @SsnL will add.

I think adding a torch.nn.moments is also a good idea, seems pretty useful.

I'm closing this in favor of the more efficient PR that should come in (hopefully) later today

body:
thanks for the PR, we have a WIP implementation of more efficient code that implements GroupNorm (dedicated GPU code) that @SsnL was going to PR today or tomorrow (as soon as the paper was out :) ). Additional to the implementation, one needs tests, which @ssnl will add.

I think adding a torch.nn.moments is also a good idea, seems pretty useful.

I'm closing this in favor of the more efficient PR that should come in (hopefully) later today
